PDA.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a very small light computer that you can carry with you, and that you use to store information such as telephone numbers, addresses, and appointments. Some PDAs can send and receive email, and connect to the Internet.
PDA.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: when someone kisses or touches their boyfriend, girlfriend, partner etc in public in a way that shows that they love them
PDA.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: She and her new boyfriend engaged in a pretty obvious PDA at the celebrity party.
PDA.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: personal digital assistant; a very small light computer that you can carry with you
